summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1367, for the improvement of Second Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-fifth Street to Pacific Place; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein sewers of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary manholes, wyes, openings, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances under Ordinance No. 15075 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
